attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Caravans cause ciaos on A roads, create traffic jams throughout the South coast in the summertime and clog up the motorway network. I propose that caravans are banned by the year 2020.  Other petitions asking for a restriction in the time a caravan can be towed do not go far enough as far as I am concerned.   I implore the UK public to support this proposal.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Ban-the-caravan/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
